alert.note: Alert for Mobile Central (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 12 at 12:51PM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Mobile County through 130 PM CDT... At 1251 PM CDT, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated a strong thunderstorm near Mobile Regional Airport, or 8 miles northwest of Tillmans Corner, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Midtown Mobile, Downtown Mobile, Prichard, I10 And I65, and Mobile Regional Airport. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
